description:
Master the creation of wonderful festive greeting cards with Google Slides. 

In this creative journey you will be taken through the simple practical steps to access a shared folder of image resources. I have prepared and follow step-by-step the process of  creation of your card demonstrating 

  • transparency
  • kinetic typography
  • movable objects

all using Google Slide transitions available for free to any user. The clear and practical guidance will ensure an effective outcome of your greeting card.  This course  both creative and practical will help you acquire the skills allowing you to create many useful card variations and also to incorporate animated transitions into your slide shows.
title: Creating an animated greeting card via Google Slides
